text: Flik and Flok may refer to: *Flik and Flok, ballet in which Rita Sangalli made her 1865 debut *Flik and Flok, fictional circus act in 1928 film Laugh, Clown, Laugh *Flik and Flok, 1863 Italian club which evolved into Armida Rowing Club ==See also== *"Flik Flok", track on 2010 album Shits & Giggles *Flik (disambiguation) *Flok (disambiguation)
title: Flik and Flok
